body.name: Pyle Retro Microphone and Swing Stand - Classic Vintage Professional Dynamic Unidirectional Audio Vocal Performance Mic w/ Adjustable Stand, XLR Cable Cord For Stage / Studio Use, Silver
features: RETRO STYLE: Pyle introduces a classic retro-style performance microphone and swing stand. It will surely add old-fashioned elegance to on-stage or in-studio performances. Allows you to enjoy tomorrow’s sound performance w/ a classic and iconic touch

49-69” ADJUSTABLE STAND: The vintage vocal mic stand features quick easy height adjustments of 49-69 inches making it perfect for all ages. Adjustments can be made by twisting the simple screw-type control knob. Mic pole stand is made of aluminum

360° TILTING MIC POLE: Features base pivot joint responsible for the adjustable and 360° rotation/tilting maneuverable mic pole stand. It automatically resets to original position when you let go of the microphone which adds style to any performance

DETACHABLE MICROPHONE: The unidirectional dynamic detachable mic stand set features high-gloss silver finish that will complement any venue. Microphone housing is made of engineered ABS plastic. Has microphone ON / OFF switch just below the mic head

INCLUDES MICROPHONE CABLE: A 16.5 feet XLR to ¼” microphone cable cord is already included in the package for your convenience. The rugged floor stand base plate has a diameter of 14.96” and is made of cast iron with a base weight of 10.8 lbs
body.description: Pyle Model : PDMICR70SLVintage Style Microphone & Swing StandClassic Retro Vintage Style Microphone & Swing Stand, Silver StyleFeatures:Classic Retro-Style Performance Microphone + StandEnjoy Tomorrow's Sound Performance with Classic & Iconic StyleStudio and Stage-Tested DesignHigh-Gloss Silver Style Polished FinishBase Pivot Joint: Adjustable & Tilting Mic Pole StandMic Pole Automatically Resets to Original Position After MovingQuick & Easy Height AdjustmentSimple Screw-Type Control KnobPerfect for On-Stage and In-Studio UseRugged Floor Stand Base PlateLightweight & Maneuverable Microphone PoleConvenient Detachable MicrophoneMicrophone ON/OFF SwitchWhat's in the Box:Detachable MicrophoneMic Swing StandXLR Cable, 16.5' ft.Base PlateTechnical Specs:Connector Type: XLR (3-Pin)Adjustable Mic Stand Height: 49.0'' - 69.0'' -inches360° Tilting Microphone Pole RotationMic Pole Stand Material: AluminumMicrophone Pattern: UnidirectionalMicrophone Element: Dynamic Moving CoilMicrophone Housing: Engineered ABS PlasticImpedance (at 1kHz): 600 Ω±30%Sensitivity (0dB = 1v/pa at 1kHz): -52±3dBFrequency Response: 50Hz-12kHzBase Diameter: 14.96'' -inchesBase Weight: 10.8 lbs.Base Material: Cast IronThe Pyle Classic Retro Vintage Style Microphone & Swing Stand, Silver Style - Classic Retro-Style Performance Microphone + Stand - Enjoy Tomorrow's Sound Performance with Classic & Iconic Style - Studio and Stage-Tested Design - High-Gloss Silver Style Polished Finish - Base Pivot Joint: Adjustable & Tilting Mic Pole Stand - Mic Pole Automatically Resets to Original Position After Moving - Quick & Easy Height Adjustment - Simple Screw-Type Control Knob - Perfect for On-Stage and In-Studio Use - Rugged Floor Stand Base Plate - Lightweight & Maneuverable Microphone Pole - Includes XLR to 1/4'' Cable, 16.5' Ft. - Detachable Microphone - Microphone ON/OFF Switch - Connector Type: XLR (3-Pin).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Features Includes XLR to 1/4'' Cable 16.5' Ft. Simple Screw-Type Control Knob High-gloss gold style polished finish Studio and stage-tested design Includes XLR to 1/4'' Cable 16.5' Ft. Retro Classic Vintage Style Microphone Swing Stand, Classic Mic System The Pyle Classic Microphone & Swing Stand System is perfect for live stage, theater, rehearsal or recording applications. Adjustable stand with a base pivot joint and a 360° tilting mic pole. The rugged floor stand base and swing arm are coated with a shiny, high-gloss polished finish to satisfy the crowd and for more comfortable performances. Provide your audience with dynamic sound, and style, with the Pyle Vintage-Style Microphone Swing Stand System. Base Material: Cast Iron Base Weight: 10.8 lbs. Base Diameter: 14.96'' Frequency Response: 50Hz-12kHz Sensitivity (0dB = 1v/pa at 1kHz): -52±3dB

Stage Performance Classic Retro-Style Microphone & Swing Stand - Studio and stage-tested design provide your audience with dynamic sound, and style. XLR Connector Integrated Cable Management - Connector Type: XLR (3-Pin), Located at Base Plate XLR connector that includes a rugged 49-69" height adjustable stand with a base pivot joint and a 360°. Easy Adjustment Height Adjustable - Heavy Cast Iron Base - Lightweight & maneuverable microphone pole design features a movable swing stand allowing you to pivot and tilt your mic while performing. Base Pilot Joint High-Gloss Gold Style Polished Finish - Base Pivot Joint: Adjustable & tilting mic pole stand environments for live stage, theater, rehearsal or recording applications.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Husband Feels Like a Rock Star
reviews.reviewText: Brought this for my husband for Christmas. He LOVES it! It's mainly for decor, he's an audiophile and wanted it for his two channel listening room.Meanwhile - it's mid-January and it's still in our living room.Really neat piece of nostalgia and I'll be getting an amp for it soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Prop For My Pinup Shoots!
reviews.reviewText: I don't know how well it works as a mic but as a prop this is PERFECT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars and they sounded equally awesome for our venue
reviews.reviewText: Cooooool mic stand! I didn't hold out much hope for the mic because the combo was so reasonable, but I used it along side a Shure 55 Vintage-Look mic that was much sturdier, and they sounded equally awesome for our venue!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars very low grade microphone
reviews.reviewText: If you want a heavy weighted mic stand then it's good. The microphone snaps and pops once XLR is plugged in. I used a better grade XLR, same issue. It's a prop mic really. The swivel part of the stand only really works if you secure the base to the floor or stand on it. If you plan on taking this out for performances, I don't think venues will let you attach it to their stage :) I bought for my kids to play with so I guess it's ok for that. Using my own mic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sound is very important.
reviews.reviewText: Did not listen to it yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2021
reviews.reviewText: It is a beautiful stand the only down side is the mic that comes with it. Very low quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2021
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I absolutely love this mic and can’t wait to use it to bring my vision to life
The mike is plastic and the threads to the metal stand have stripped out. Garbage.Stand and base are fine. Now I need a new mike
